author: Richard Eldred
title: Outcry As Muslim Children in Italy Exempted From Studying Dante
text:
An Italian school‚Äôs move to exempt Muslim kids from being taught Dante‚Äôs The Divine Comedy ‚Äì because he stuck Mohammed in hell ‚Äì has whipped up a storm over cancel culture. The Telegraph has more .
Politicians from both the Left and Right said that Dante was a pillar of Italian literature and that it was unacceptable for children to be exempted from studying his writing because of their faith.
The row broke out after a secondary school in Treviso in the north of the country reportedly allowed two Muslim children, aged around 14, to not attend classes in which The Divine Comedy was being studied.
Written at the start of the 14th Century, it is an allegorical poem that revolves around a man‚Äôs journey to Hell, Purgatory and Paradise, aided by two guides, Virgil and Beatrice.
In the epic work, Dante places the Prophet Mohammed and his cousin Ali in Hell, where they are tortured by sword-wielding demons.
‚ÄúHow is Mohammed mangled! Before me walks Ali weeping, from the chin his face cleft to the forelock,‚Äù Dante wrote.
The exemption was criticised by MPs from across the political spectrum. ‚Ä¶
Carlo Pasquetto, a member of the centre-Left Azione party, said it was ‚Äúmadness‚Äù to view Dante as being offensive to Muslims.
‚ÄúDante is the father of humanism, of Italy, of Europe. To decide not to teach him in the name of a false conception of tolerance will create enormous problems of integration in society. This is not tolerance, nor integration, it is the suicide of the West which instead of celebrating plurality is cancelling its own identity.‚Äù Dante should be taught to all children in Italy, he said, ‚Äúregardless of the colour of their skin or the religion of their parents‚Äù.
Worth reading in full .

author: Extra Staff
title: Candice King & Steven Krueger Seem to Confirm Romance with a Kiss
text:
Getty Images ‚ÄúThe Vampire Diaries‚Äù star Candice King, 36, and ‚ÄúThe Originals‚Äù actor Steven Krueger, 34, have tongues wagging after they shared a kiss on Instagram.
King included the PDA in a recap of 2023 , as she played out some of her most memorable moments from the past year, which included a smooch with Steven.
Instagram "I laughed. I cried. I laughed til I cried. I loved," she wrote in the caption. "Thanks for the dance 2023 ü•Ç."
Fans were tickled by the news that King, who played Caroline Forbes in ‚ÄúThe Vampire Diaries,‚Äù and Krueger, who played Josh Rosza on the spin-off ‚ÄúThe Originals,‚Äù are an item!
Instagram One fan wrote, ‚ÄúCaroline and Josh were not on my 2023 bingo card but I'm here for it üòç‚Äù and another gushed, ‚ÄúYou were kissing Josh ‚Äù
Yet another fan called the romance ‚Äúunexpected,‚Äù sharing, ‚ÄúI got butterflies.‚Äù
King was previously married to the Fray guitarist Joe King for seven years. She filed for divorce in May 2022. The exes share two daughters.
